ios.subtitle: From Farming Town to Big City

editorialNotes.standard: Custom decks, quick matches, and new twists make this smartly designed mobile spin on the beloved card collector a great fit for both newcomers and veterans.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Wreak Havoc as the Top Cat!

editorialNotes.standard: We wouldn’t be surprised if Subway Surfers kept its spot near the top of the charts for decades to come. Its heart is the key to its stamina, revealed in loving details lavished on cities from Chicago to Shenzhen in its World Tours or in the lovable ruffians awarded in its frequent events. It’s a cinch to pick up, but we’re still finding new ways to master it years and miles later.
There’s a new king in town! Upgrade entire realms while battling an evil Dark King in the slick follow-up to Royal Match.
This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals’ property, and rake in profits.

Miniclip’s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

editorialNotes.standard: Brew and serve espressos, lattes, and other caffeinated concoctions while building a bustling business in this charming coffee shop sim from the makers of Good Pizza, Great Pizza.

ios.subtitle: Tap tiles in fun music game

editorialNotes.standard: This action-packed sequel hits its mark thanks to a quiver full of tweaks, including faster battles, PvP matches, and fantastic new skills to discover.

editorialNotes.tagline: No data? No problem! Whether you’re hopping onto a plane or heading off the grid, disconnect with this great game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone’s suspicious in Among Us!, a fascinating multiplayer game set aboard a damaged spaceship. Whether you’re a Crewmate making quick repairs or an Impostor taking out key systems (and unsuspecting players), each match is a riveting mystery. And a hilarious one, especially when smart accusations or sly misdirection sway who gets voted off the ship. It’s a test of wits anyone can enjoy.
editorialNotes.short: Customize your look with Halloween-themed hats.

name: Super Slicer: Idle Game
artistName: OREON STUDIOS OYUN YAZILIM TEKNOLOJI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

ios.subtitle: Cut Fish and Fruits with knife

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Step up to the plate as Ohtani, Soto, and other MLB greats in awesomely animated pitcher/batter duels.
Quickly sift through colorful clutter to find identical items in this clever spin on match-3 puzzling.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.
We love chilling with friends in this classic card game’s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.

It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.

editorialNotes.tagline: Tons of fun on one screen

editorialNotes.standard: Clobber pesky rebels while rallying villagers and recruiting heroes in this idle strategic defense game.

A phenomenon from the start, Pokémon GO hasn’t stopped evolving. Since launch, the best-in-class location-based AR game has expanded with countless improvements. Hatch eggs while the game runs in the background. Battle other trainers with your favorite creatures. Join memorable community day events. With a steady stream of awesome updates and hundreds of iconic creatures to catch, Niantic’s groundbreaking hit just keeps getting better.

editorialNotes.standard: Adventure across a modern cityscape filled with raids, dungeons, and lots of monsters in this gorgeous action RPG based on the popular webtoon.

editorialNotes.standard: Be the last player standing in this incredible mobile take on the blockbuster battle royale, which goes above and beyond with deep customizability and cutting-edge graphics.
